descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v198/DarkLink6235/dragonwrathlogocropped_zps859d9523.png[/img][/center]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Description[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dragonwrath, Tarecgosa\'s Rest. The ultimate reward for defeating Ragnaros from within the Firelands. The legendary staff from World of Warcraft makes its appearance in Skyrim. After defeating and banishing Alduin, the World Eater, the knowledge on how to craft this legendary staff is left inside the mind of the last Dragonborn. The legendary staff can only be created at the Skyforge using a moderate amount of reagents. Once crafted, equip the staff and use it to summon Tarecgosa, dragon of the Blue Dragonflight to fight for you for a minute.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]How to Get[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In order to unlock the recipe to craft the staff, you must complete the main story line. To craft it you need the following materials at the Skyforge:

Dragon Bone x1
Dragon Scale x1
Flawless Emerald x2
Iron Ingot x2
Linen Cloth x2
Firewood x6

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Known Issues[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Tarecgosa follows too closely resulting in sometimes getting stuck between the dragon\'s neck and wing. Tried custom packages, tried repurposing other packages, nothing seems to work.

2. When exiting combat, Tarecgosa will fly off into a random direction eventually poping back below the player in the ground.

The ultimate goal is to have Tarecgosa orbit the player when spawned and not in combat and return to the orbit when combat is over. I\'ve been able to get one or the other, combat or orbit, but not both. If I set the orbit on spawn, she just flys straight up until combat starts then exsibit issue #2 after combat. I\'ve tried duplicating Durnehviir and using his spawn script but nothing seems to work.

If you have any insite into these issues, please message me. I\'ll give you proper credit if you help me get it fixed.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]To-Do List[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Add a custom texture (slim chance of custom model) to Tarecgosa to get her closer to her WoW counterpart
-Animate the blue fire
-Add Tassels
-Add and animate scrolling glyphs on the head of the staff
-Animate the head of the staff and the floating gems (If anyone knows about making custom animations, possible without a skeleton, feel free to message me)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Compatibility[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dragonwrath, Tarecgosa\'s should be compatible with all mods. If you find one it is incompatible with, please message me and I\'ll work on fixing it.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Installation[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4][u]Install with Nexus Mod Manager[/u][/size]
1. Click \"Download with Manager\" button. 
2. Double click \"Dragonwrath - Tarecgosa\'s Rest\" in Nexus Mod Manager to activate.

[size=4][u]Manual Install[/u][/size]
1. Extract the zip file
2. Inside the extracted folder, copy \"Dragonwrath.esp\" and paste it in your \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder.
3. Copy the \"meshes\" folder and paste it in your \"Skyrim\\Data folder\". Click \"Yes\" to the dialog windows that pop up.
4. Copy the \"textures\" folder and paste it in your \"Skyrim\\Data folder\". Click \"Yes\" to the dialog windows that pop up.

[size=4][u]Uninstall with Nexus Mod Manager[/u][/size]
1. Double click \"Dragonwrath - Tarecgosa\'s Rest\" in Nexus Mod Manager to deactivate.

[size=4][u]Manual Uninstall[/u][/size]
1. Delete \"Dragonwrath.esp\" from the \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder.
2. Delete the \"dragonwrath\" folder in \"Data\\meshes\\weapons\" directory.
3. Delete the \"dragonwrath\" folder in \"Data\\textures\\weapons\" directory.
